categories: Category:Coruscant Security Force divisions and units

nodes.text: The Forensics Unit, also known as the Forensics Service, was the criminal evidence unit operated by the Coruscant Security Force.
The Forensics Unit was staffed by Scenes of Crimes Officers and Crime scene investigation droids. It also operated a morgue in the CSF Headquarters.
During the Clone Wars the Forensics Unit responded to an explosion at Depot Bravo Five.
In 40 ABY forensics units responded to the the bombing of The Elite Hotel and the murder of Jedi Master Tresina Lobi.
